overview: Rarely is permission given to surf the forbidden breaks of the Fiji island chain, so when a select group of top international surfers gets the opportunity, it becomes a trip of legendary proportions. Discovering the surf treasures of hidden islands, these pros go at it knowing it's a once-in-a-lifetime experience. The adventure features Ian Wash, Andy Irons, Alex Gray, Bruce Irons, Keala Kennelly, Mick Fanning, Jamie O'Brien, Ben Dunn and more.
title: Toka Toka: Forbidden Fiji
